lead_paragraph: Fresh off the previous night’s 6-3 loss to the Devils, the Ottawa Senators received another blow by the Islanders in a 5-2 loss on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Islanders Wallop Senators, as the Devils Did Before Them
headline.main: Islanders Wallop Senators, as the Devils Did Before Them

snippet: Fresh off the previous night’s 6-3 loss to the Devils, the Ottawa Senators received another blow by the Islanders in a 5-2 loss on Friday.
